name: Corey Loiacano
coverLetter: My goal is to make a living off positively impacting communities. I have worked on indoor grows back east for over 5 years, and I have spent 2 seasons on outdoor gardens and greenhouses in Southern Oregon. I have a professional cannabis resume that includes experience at Shadow Box Farms (tier 2 rec) and the Releaf Society (temp agency). I trimmed over 100lbs last season in a short stint, I am well beyond entry level.
